title: Work-Based Learning Program for Professional Identity Development in Psychology Interns

context.prior_knowledge: Basic psychological theories and comprehension of counseling techniques
context.additional_context: A competency-building program for professional identity development in crisis situations such as COVID-19

learning_goals: Participants can explain three or more core elements of professional identity in a work-based learning (WBL) environment.
Participants can apply psychological resilience enhancement strategies in crisis situations to real-world cases.
Participants can create and execute a professional development plan based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
